channel.title: How do i change my Male + Female to old ? CLICK ME FOR MORE INFO
channel.description:
[b]I have not 508 or 562 HD, i have a simply source and client looks like this ( but small HD, look at this male ): [/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ch9Hr9p.jpg[/img]
[b]Now, my question is how do i change that to Old Male/female like this:[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U0vzul2.jpg[/img]
If you know how, please EXAPLIN.
Thanks.

item.title: How do i change my Male + Female to old ? CLICK ME FOR MORE INFO
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

i think it’d be pointless since obviously you’re either using a copy of Galkon’s 317 client with HD models or a PI server. In which case none of the newer models will work if you replace the character model only. I’d say just download a different client. Preferably just a regular Galkon Client. That would save you allot of work changing interfaces ect… for those starting orbs mentioned in your other thread.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my Male + Female to old ? CLICK ME FOR MORE INFO
